original: 翻梵語卷第十🔽草名第六十三
analyzed: 翻梵語卷第十 草名第六十三
translated: Volume 10 of the Translation of Sanskrit Texts🔽Grass Names, Number 63

original: 香名第六十四🔽也　　　　　　　　　　　道成
analyzed: 香名第六十四 也　　　　　　　　　　　道成

original: 同四月十日於同院之南面令校合了　深圓右全部十卷以地藏院深賢師傳飯之本遂書功校讐令收納觀智院經藏了寬保元辛酉年八月二十八日　僧正賢賀俗齒五十八
analyzed: 同四月十日於同院之南面令校合了　深圓右全部十卷以地藏院深賢師傳飯之本遂書功校讐令收納觀智院經藏了寬保元辛酉年八月二十八日　僧正賢賀俗齒五十八
translated: On the same day, the tenth day of the fourth month, proofread at the southern side of the same temple. The entire ten volumes were proofread by Shen Yuan. Using the text transmitted by Master Shenxian of Dizang Temple, the work was completed and proofread. It was then stored in the canon of Guan Zhi Temple. On the twenty-eighth day of the eighth month in the first year of the Kangen era (1169), the twenty-eighth year of the monk's life, fifty-eight years old in the secular world.
